name: Last Hope (itch)
description:
LAST HOPEDeveloped by FortyKeks ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

This is a spooky 3D First Person experience which is totally not a shameless Slender rip-off. It's kinda like Slender but in the future. Uh- I mean this is a fun interactive adventure where you get to uh... run away from an enemy while collecting pages- I mean data cards. Now at the core of the game is a "story as a reward" philosophy, slowly revealing the backstory behind your game as you progress with the gameplay.

Controls
  • Bring up phone - Escape
  • Movement - WASD
